name: blockchain-loom
description: Decentralized tree-based text generation interface on Ethereum

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:active: forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js active rpcUrl) --private-key $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js active privateKey) --with-gas-price $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js active gasPrice) --broadcast
scripts.deploy:local: ACTIVE_CHAIN_ID=31337 forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js 31337 rpcUrl) --private-key $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js 31337 privateKey) --with-gas-price $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js 31337 gasPrice) --broadcast
scripts.deploy:sepolia: ACTIVE_CHAIN_ID=11155111 forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js 11155111 rpcUrl) --private-key $(node scripts/getChainConfig.js 11155111 privateKey) --broadcast
scripts.blockscout:stop: docker-compose -f docker-compose.blockscout.yml down && sudo rm -rf blockscout-services-data

author: Blockchain Loom Team
